ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you nonetheless regard this discourse with scorn
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then why do you dissimulate this Revelation?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do you, then, take this discourse in light esteem,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would you say that this statement is a lie?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So is this the matter regarding which you laze?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is it such a talk that you are Mudhinun
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do you then hold this announcement in contempt?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do you hold this discourse in disdain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Is it this Statement that ye scorn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: How can you regard this discourse with disdain?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is it this discourse that ye hold lightly?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: What! Do you take lightly this discourse?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is it such a Message that ye would hold in light esteem?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is it such a talk (this Quran) that you (disbelievers) deny?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What, do you hold this discourse in disdain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is it this discourse that you take so lightly?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:81]   Do you then belittle, [do you] take lightly and deny, this discourse?, the Qur’ān.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Is it this Statement) is it this Qur'an which Muhammad (pbuh) recites to you, people of Mecca, (that ye scorn) that you deny, and claim that there is no Paradise or hell, resurrection or reckoning, as the Prophet says,
